thread.section_title: Taj 51 Buckingham Gate Suites and Residences - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent Hotel
thread.title_full: Excellent Hotel - Review of Taj 51 Buckingham Gate Suites and Residences, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: ryanwB7236CO
title: Excellent Hotel
text: The hotel was nothing less than amazing. The location was central. The room was unexpectedly spacious. The staff, especially the concierge staff, were extremely attentive and accommodating. We will never need to look for another hotel while in London as we will always go back to Taj 51.
